name: safer-runner
description: Network security layer for GitHub Actions with DNS filtering and log analysis

scripts.build: tsc && ncc build lib/main.js -o dist/main --source-map --license licenses.txt && mv dist/main/index.js dist/main.js && mv dist/main/index.js.map dist/main.js.map
scripts.build:post: ncc build lib/post.js -o dist/post --source-map --license licenses.txt && mv dist/post/index.js dist/post.js && mv dist/post/index.js.map dist/post.js.map
scripts.package: npm run clean && npm run build && npm run build:post

author: PortSwigger
